Index.title: Blat Vodka
Index.description: The purest Vodka in the world.
Index.purity2: reduces the negative effects of a hangover
Index.purity4: short or long, it's the ideal drink

qualities.desc1: The only vodka on the market with certified analysis guaranteeing total absence of impurities.
qualities.desc2: Premium ingredient approved by the French government, ensuring natural and high-quality origin.
qualities.desc3: Sourced from horizontal rain in the Canary Islands, delivering exceptional purity to the product.

BottleShow.title:
Blat Vodka achieves
what no other
Premium Vodka has

About.title: About Blat Vodka
About.description1: Fernando and Esteban Banús, third-generation distillers, transformed their family heritage into Blat Vodka — a revolutionary vodka born in the Canary Islands.
About.description2: Crafted with French wheat and water filtered through volcanic rock, Blat Vodka achieves a certified purity of 0.0%. Its smoothness and flavor make it the purest vodka in the world.
About.description3: The bottle, designed by the Peter Schmidt Group, reflects the vodka’s purity. It has won international awards for its elegance and crystal-clear simplicity.

Agua.title: Pure Essence of the Atlantic
Agua.description: Our vodka is diluted with pure Atlantic rainwater, naturally filtered through the volcanic rocks of the Canary Islands. A unique environment that delivers unmatched purity and authentic character to the spirit.

PathnamesPage.description:
The pathnames are internationalized too.

If you're using the default language English, you'll see /en/pathnames in the browser address bar on this page.

If you change the locale to German, the URL is localized accordingly (/de/pfadnamen).
